CustomField.description: Skip RRP/Permit check for these record types
CustomField.formula: OR( RecordType.Name = "Change Order" , RecordType.Name = "Internal" , RecordType.Name = "Installation Product Check-In" , RecordType.Name = "TCS Work Order" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Skip RRP/Permit check for these record types
CustomField.label: Skip RRP/Permit Check
